raw: * Provides methods for widgets that can be controlled by the user.
* Usually this operation includes sending values to the backend.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Provides methods for widgets that can be controlled by the user. Usually this operation includes sending values to the backend.

raw: * Action performed when the widget got clicked, sends data to the backend

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Action performed when the widget got clicked, sends data to the backend

raw: * Send the given value to all writeable addresses known to this widget
* @param filter {Function} optional filter function for addresses
* @param currentBusValues {Object} optional: the (assumed) last encoded values
*          that were sent on the bus. When the encoding of the new value
*          to send is equal to the currentBusValues a transmission will
*          be suppressed. The object is a hash with the encoding as a key
* @return {Object} the object/hash of encoded values that were sent last time

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Send the given value to all writeable addresses known to this widget

@param.name: @param
@param.body: filter {Function} optional filter function for addresses

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
currentBusValues {Object} optional: the (assumed) last encoded values
          that were sent on the bus. When the encoding of the new value
          to send is equal to the currentBusValues a transmission will
          be suppressed. The object is a hash with the encoding as a key
          for the encoded value
@param.description:
optional: the (assumed) last encoded values
          that were sent on the bus. When the encoding of the new value
          to send is equal to the currentBusValues a transmission will
          be suppressed. The object is a hash with the encoding as a key
          for the encoded value

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Object} the object/hash of encoded values that were sent last time
@return.description: the object/hash of encoded values that were sent last time
